casebody.data:
BRANCH BANKING & TRUST COMPANY
v.
PEACOCK FARM, INC., et al. No. 230A15-1. Supreme Court of North Carolina. Sept. 16, 2015. Michael J. Newman, Pinehurst, for Lynch, Rodolphe T. William Van O'Linda, Jr., Pinehurst, for Lynch, Rodolphe T. John N. Hutson, Jr., Raleigh, for Branch Banking and Trust Company. Brian E. Moore, Raleigh. R. Palmer Sugg, Raleigh, for Rhodes, Willard A., et al. Matthew M. Lawless, for Branch Banking and Trust Company.

Opinion

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 8th of September 2015 by Plaintiff to Supplement the Record:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 16th of September 2015."
